title: records accordingly on receipt of such intimation and on payment of such fees by owner as may be decided by the Government
clause_text: records accordingly on receipt of such intimation and on payment of such fees by owner as may be decided by the Government. A separate property register card thereof in the name of MCGM shall be submitted by owner before seeking Occupation Certificate for any part of building/buildings beyond 75%of permissible BUA as per Zonal (basic) FSI, or granting Occupation Certificate to any of the building other than amenity, whichever is earlier.
section: Conditions for Development of reserved land under Accommodation Reservation (AR)
